column4: i have a dual-boot system, and after a crash last night, GRUB is no longer responding to the arrow down key (arrow up strangely works), i looked at /boot/menu.lst but couldn't find anything out of the ordinary
perhaps your key is not working at all, tested it to be sure it works?
heh, it doesn't seem to work in emacs either
might be able to use the number pad direction keys, be sure the numlock is OFF an they should act as the direction keys
ill shut down an replug keyboard, first if it works I'll let you know :)
it's working again, solution: 1) hold keyboard upside down 2) shake it :D
a Hammer would have been more fun imo :)
often the problem is simpler then I think :P i was thinking something was wrong with GRUB, when it in fact was fine. thanks a lot )
and yes a hammer would have been more fun ^^
I been using the same keyboard for close to 10 years, I have bought dozens of replacements an never liked the feel of any new ones, I will die when this one gives out.
